TopicTitle: Looking for an old spacecraft of epic...

Articles.Content:
I remember this from around 0.18 times.

I belive it was built by "ascension".

It was a super-mega mothership, that carried like 30 individual landers to laythe.

Anyone got a link?

This guy, found it: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/12630-Ascensiam

EDIT: Might've been lost in the april purge. Looks like this is similar:
